title: Google Scholar
description: Google Scholar provides a simple way to broadly search for scholarly literature. From one place, you can search across many disciplines and sources: peer-reviewed papers, theses, books, abstracts and articles, from academic publishers, professional societies, preprint repositories, universities and other scholarly organizations. Use this link to get seamless access to IIT-subscribed journal content, or go to the Scholar Preferences section to set Illinois Institute of Technology as your primary Library Link.
